steps.1: Heat-Heat the contents of the mug for 1 minute and serve
steps.2: Add-Add 1/5 teaspoon cinnamon to the mug
steps.3: Mix-Mix the contents of the mug
steps.5: Add-Add 1 teaspoon of white sugar to the mug
steps.6: Fill-Fill a microwave-safe mug with skimmed milk
steps.7: Microwave-Microwave the contents of the mug for 1 minute
steps.8: Add-Add 2 pieces of chocolate to the mug
